Metadata.title: Dastan Abikov
Metadata.description: Entrepreneur, investor, speaker, activist, and diplomat. Dastan Abikov was born in 1999 in Bishkek, Kyrgyz Republic.

interviewYoutube.title: Interview with Dastan Abikov
interviewYoutube.description: Dastan Abikov talks about his life, business, and future plans

neoplaceArticle.title: Neoplace: Discovering the Ultimate Nomadic Lifestyle
neoplaceArticle.description: Neoplace revolutionizes the modern-day nomadic lifestyle with innovative solutions.

sputnikArticle.title: The 17-Year-Old Entrepreneur Who Earned $500 a Day
sputnikArticle.description: The businessman was interviewed by Sputnik Kyrgyzstan correspondent Asel Minbaeva.

Biography.subtitle: Biography
Biography.title: I WAS BORN IN 1999 IN BISHKEK, KYRGYZ REPUBLIC. I STUDIED AT THE KYRGYZ ECONOMIC UNIVERSITY AND HARVARD BUSINESS SCHOOL

shortFacts.0: At 15 I began my entrepreneurial journey.
shortFacts.1: At 21 I earned my first million dollars.
shortFacts.2: At 23 I developed a socio-economic development program for the Kyrgyz Republic.
shortFacts.3: At 24 I spoke at a commission meeting at the United Nations.

2.description:
• Founded a successful company in construction industry
  • Recognized by MIT as one of the most promising young entrepreneurs
  • Received support from the Prime Minister of Kyrgyz Republic

3.description: • Graduated from Tursun Temirova’s School in Kochkor city, Naryn region

4.description:
• Earned first million dollars
  • Became a sponsor of the Jiu-Jitsu Federation of Kyrgyzstan
  • Sponsored the cultural project - Ilgeri
  • Joined the U.S. Chamber of Commerce

5.description:
• Completed a professional education program at Harvard Business School
  • Became a member of the Harvard Business School community
  • Developed a socio-economic development program for the Kyrgyz Republic

6.description:
• Graduated from the economic program at the Kyrgyz Economic University
  • Founded the Kyrgyz Foundation, which runs scholarship programs

7.description:
• Established the Sustainable Mountain Development Foundation in New York
  • Joined the Mountain Partnership at the United Nations
  • Spoke at a commission meeting at the United Nations

KyrgyzFund.title: Kyrgyz Foundation
KyrgyzFund.description: Our foundation aims to develop human potential. We believe, that successful generation will create a strong economy and a prosperous country. Apply for the scholarship program.

EconomicProgram.title: Economic Development Program
EconomicProgram.description: Dastan Abikov’s vision for achieving an economic breakthrough in the Kyrgyz Republic
